data.prayer: Father, help the 123 believers in Rize to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rize, Turkey
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Rize who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Rize to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Rize, Turkey.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Turkish people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Turkish people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Turkish people is yours.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 326,240 who are far from you in Rize, Turkey from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Rize, Turkey the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Rize, Turkey be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

location.name: Rize
location.people_groups_list: Hemshin, Arab, Iraqi, Chechen, Arab, Syrian, Arab, North Iraqi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Hemshin (22,000), Arab, Iraqi (112,000), Chechen (112,000), Arab, Syrian (587,000), Arab, North Iraqi (568,000)
